# Noto Color Emoji Font

This folder should contain the **Noto Color Emoji** font file.

## Download Instructions

Download `NotoColorEmoji.ttf` from one of these official sources:

### Option 1: GitHub (Recommended)

1. Visit: https://github.com/googlefonts/noto-emoji
2. In the README, click the "font" link under "Color Font"
3. Save the file as `NotoColorEmoji.ttf` in this folder

Or use curl:
```bash
curl -L -o NotoColorEmoji.ttf "https://github.com/googlefonts/noto-emoji/raw/main/fonts/NotoColorEmoji.ttf"
```

### Option 2: Google Noto Fonts

1. Visit: https://fonts.google.com/noto/specimen/Noto+Color+Emoji
2. Download and extract
3. Copy the TTF file to this folder

## After Downloading

Your folder structure should look like:
```
third_party/noto-emoji/
├── NotoColorEmoji.ttf    ← The font file
├── LICENSE_OFL.txt       ← License file (included)
└── README.md             ← This file
```
